message.entry: TransmitCorrelationMatrix must be either a matrix or a three-dimensional array with the first dimension no larger than 8.
The transmit spatial correlation matrix specified for each path must be a valid correlation matrix.
ReceiveCorrelationMatrix must be either a matrix or a three-dimensional array with the first dimension no larger than 8.
The receive spatial correlation matrix specified for each path must be a valid correlation matrix.
Transmit antenna selection is only supported for more than one transmit antenna.
Receive antenna selection is only supported for more than one receive antenna.
When TransmitCorrelationMatrix is a three-dimensional array, its third dimension must be equal to the length of PathDelays.
When ReceiveCorrelationMatrix is a three-dimensional array, its third dimension must be equal to the length of PathDelays.
CenterFreqGaussian1 and SigmaGaussian1 of a BiGaussian Doppler spectrum object must be chosen so that abs(CenterFreqGaussian1) + SigmaGaussian1*sqrt(2*log(2)) is not greater than 1.
CenterFreqGaussian2 and SigmaGaussian2 of a BiGaussian Doppler spectrum object must be chosen so that abs(CenterFreqGaussian2) + SigmaGaussian2*sqrt(2*log(2)) is not greater than 1.

AntennaPairsToDisplay must have the first element in [1, Nt] and second element in [1, Nr], where Nt/Nr is the number of transmit/receive antennas, or equivalently, the first dimension of the transmit/receive correlation matrix.
